t: Reload Your Balance - Amazon Customer Service
s: Auto Reload when your balance drops: When your gift card balance drops to the selected minimum balance, we add the Auto Reload amount to your gift card balance. We charge the payment method you chose. Funds should be available within ten minutes but may not be available for up to four hours.

t: Modify or Turn off Your Amazon Gift Card Balance Auto-Reload - Amazon Customer Service
